challenges.title: FizzBuzz
challenges.description: Write a Cubit program that prints the numbers from 1 to 20. For multiples of 3, print 'Fizz' instead of the number, for multiples of 5 print 'Buzz', and for numbers which are multiples of both 3 and 5 print 'FizzBuzz'.

challenges.title: Palindrome Checker
challenges.description: Write a Cubit function that checks if a string is a palindrome (reads the same forwards and backwards). Print 'Yes' if it is, 'No' otherwise.
